  • public class MulticlassSimpleAL<T>
extends ActiveLearner<T>

    Extension to multiclass of the Simple active learning strategy as presented in:
    Support vector machine active learning with applications to text classification. S. Tong and D. Koller. Journal of Machine Learning Research, 2:45â€“66, 2001.

    picard
